heading: HB06972
0: AN ACT RENAMING THE EASTERN VISAYAS REGIONAL MEDICAL CENTER IN THE CITY OF TACLOBAN, PROVINCE OF LEYTE INTO THE EASTERN VISAYAS MEDICAL CENTER, INCREASING ITS BED CAPACITY FROM FIVE HUNDRED (500) TO ONE THOUSAND FIVE HUNDRED (1,500), AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
short-title: Renaming The Eastern Visayas Regional Medical Center In The City Of Tacloban, Province Of Leyte Into The Eastern Visayas Medical Center, Increasing Its Bed Capacity From Five Hundred (500) To One Thousand Five Hundred (1,500)
